name: Ciprofloxacin

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A CORN

contraindications: ciprofloxacin tablets administered orally described appropriate guidelines tables .
warningsAndPrecautions: ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 250 mg available round , white film-coated tablets debossed “ y101 ” one side . ndc 60760-690-10 bottles 10 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . preserve well-closed container .
contraindications_original: Ciprofloxacin tablets should be administered orally as described in the appropriate Dosage Guidelines tables.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 250 mg are available as round, white film-coated tablets debossed with “Y101” on one side.
                  
                  NDC 60760-690-10 BOTTLES OF 10
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Preserve in well-closed container.
